hero.intro: Hello! I'm Bobby Ho. A passionate Full-stack React Developer from Hong Kong <emoji> üî•</emoji>

experience.title: Experience <emoji>üéØ</emoji>
experience.frontendDevelopment: I'm proficient in responsive web design. I can build application from scratch by using CSS, HTML, Javascript to using frameworks like React and Next.js with Tailwind.
experience.backendDevelopment: I'm experienced in Node.js, Nest.js and Express.js. I excel in building APIs using DTO pattern and third-party API such as Sanity, Stripe, Shopify. Also I can integrate relational databases like Postgres or document databases like Firestore.
experience.passionateProgrammer: I love utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques. Also enjoy writing clean, maintainable, and well-documented code to ensure code quality and best practices.
experience.teamPlayer: As a former HKUST Dragon Boat Team captain, I understand the importance of teamwork and enjoy being a team player. Thats why I'm confident in collaborating with cross-functional teams for high-quality product delivery.

project.title: Projects <emoji>üê£</emoji>
project.subtitle: Some of the projects I'm recently working on
project.startupWeb: Developed a fully responsive website for a startup. The site has a CMS for client to manage website content and E-commerce shop for their sales.
project.mobileApp: A simple Pomodoro Timer app using Flutter. You can customize your study timer and choose from a variety of aesthetic themes.
